pullRequest.title: TDI-43764 : MsSQL NVARCHAR
pullRequest.bodyText:
Use setNString method for NVARCHAR and NCHAR columns
What is the current behavior? (You can also link to an open issue here)
Method setString il always used to set the value of a string column
What is the new behavior?
Code now checks if the column is a NVARCHAR or NCHAR type and then use setString or setNString accordingly
Please check if the PR fulfills these requirements

nodes.bodyText:
Like in the code upper, use the style "constant.equals(var)"
if("String".equals(typeToGenerate) {
if ("NVARCHAR".equalsIgnoreCase(column.dataType) || 

It won't fail if a value is null (and it's hard to see if it can be or not with the function size).
